Name: Core Passive: Heatwave
Additional Ability: Fields of Fire
Descriptions: When triggering <color=#FFFFFF>Fire Suppression</color> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, increase that attack's DMG by <color=#2BAD00>35%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
Soldier 11 deals 10% more <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>. When attacking Stunned enemies, this effect is further enhanced by an additional 22.5%.
When triggering <color=#FFFFFF>Fire Suppression</color> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, increase that attack's DMG by <color=#2BAD00>40.8%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
Soldier 11 deals 10% more <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>. When attacking Stunned enemies, this effect is further enhanced by an additional 22.5%.
When triggering <color=#FFFFFF>Fire Suppression</color> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, increase that attack's DMG by <color=#2BAD00>46.6%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
Soldier 11 deals 10% more <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>. When attacking Stunned enemies, this effect is further enhanced by an additional 22.5%.
When triggering <color=#FFFFFF>Fire Suppression</color> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, increase that attack's DMG by <color=#2BAD00>52.5%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
Soldier 11 deals 10% more <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>. When attacking Stunned enemies, this effect is further enhanced by an additional 22.5%.
When triggering <color=#FFFFFF>Fire Suppression</color> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, increase that attack's DMG by <color=#2BAD00>58.3%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
Soldier 11 deals 10% more <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>. When attacking Stunned enemies, this effect is further enhanced by an additional 22.5%.
When triggering <color=#FFFFFF>Fire Suppression</color> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, increase that attack's DMG by <color=#2BAD00>64.1%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
Soldier 11 deals 10% more <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>. When attacking Stunned enemies, this effect is further enhanced by an additional 22.5%.
When triggering <color=#FFFFFF>Fire Suppression</color> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, increase that attack's DMG by <color=#2BAD00>70%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
Soldier 11 deals 10% more <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>. When attacking Stunned enemies, this effect is further enhanced by an additional 22.5%.

Cons.Name: Rapid Heat
Cons.Effect: When Soldier 11 enters combat or switches in, if her Energy is less than 40, her Energy is recovered to 80. This effect can trigger once every 50s.

Cons.Name: Scorching Convergence
Cons.Effect: When triggering <color=#FFFFFF>Fire Suppression</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, and <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color> DMG increases by 3%, up to 12 stacks, lasting 15s, with the duration of each stack calculated separately.

Cons.Name: Indulgent Blaze
Cons.Effect:
If <color=#FFFFFF>Fire Suppression</color> is triggered during the 1st, 2nd, or 3rd hit of Soldier 11's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or a <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, Anti-Interrupt Level increases and DMG received is reduced by 18% during skill activation.
If <color=#FFFFFF>Fire Suppression</color> is triggered during the 4th hit of her <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, she becomes invulnerable during skill activation.

Cons.Name: Scorching Flow
Cons.Effect:
When Soldier 11 uses her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, she gains 8 stacks of Charge (max 8 stacks).
When <color=#FFFFFF>Fire Suppression</color> is triggered, 1 stack of Charge is consumed, causing the current move to ignore 25% of the target's <color=#FF5521>Fire RES</color>.
